ne14:2.3.pli: Kā ca pakatikathāya desanā, cattāri saccāni.

ne14:2.5.pli: “idaṃ dukkhan”ti ayaṃ paññatti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ channaṃ dhātūnaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ dasannaṃ indriyānaṃ nikkhepapaññatti.

ne14:3.1.pli: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ.

ne14:3.2.pli: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.

ne14:3.3.pli: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.

ne14:3.4.pli: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.

ne14:3.5.pli: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.

ne14:3.6.pli: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, sasokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, sadaraṃ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.

ne14:4.3.pli: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ.

ne14:4.4.pli: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.

ne14:4.5.pli: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.

ne14:4.6.pli: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.

ne14:4.7.pli: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.

ne14:4.8.pli: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, sasokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, sadaraṃ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.

ne14:4.9.pli: Ayaṃ pabhavapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa ca.

ne14:5.1.pli: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ.

ne14:5.2.pli: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.

ne14:5.3.pli: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.

ne14:5.4.pli: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.

ne14:5.5.pli: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.

ne14:5.6.pli: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, asokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, adaraṃ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.

ne14:6.3.pli: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ.

ne14:6.4.pli: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.

ne14:6.5.pli: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.

ne14:6.6.pli: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.

ne14:6.7.pli: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.

ne14:6.8.pli: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, asokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, adaraṃ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.

ne14:7.1.pli: Ayaṃ pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.

ne14:8.2.pli: Appamatto nipako sato, samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ne14:8.5.pli: “Rūpā aniccā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti “cakkhuviññāṇaṃ aniccan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ne14:8.7.pli: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ne14:9.9.pli: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ne14:10.1.pli: Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.

ne14:11.1.pli: Rūpaṃ, rādha, vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.

ne14:11.5.pli: saṅkhāre viññāṇaṃ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.

ne14:12.1.pli: Ayaṃ nirodhapaññatti nirodhassa, nibbidāpaññatti assādassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.

ne14:13.1.pli: “So idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ne14:14.1.pli: Ayaṃ paṭivedhapaññatti saccānaṃ, nikkhepapaññatti dassanabhūmiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti sotāpattiphalassa.

ne14:14.2.pli: “So ime āsavā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ āsavasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ āsavanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ne14:15.1.pli: Ayaṃ uppādapaññatti khaye ñāṇassa, okāsapaññatti anuppāde ñāṇassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, ārambhapaññatti vīriyindriyassa, āhaṭanāpaññatti āsāṭikānaṃ, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanābhūmiyā, abhinighātapaññatti pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ.

ne14:16.1.pli: Idaṃ “dukkhan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ne14:16.4.pli: Ayaṃ “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ne14:17.1.pli: Ayaṃ desanāpaññatti saccānaṃ, nikkhepapaññatti sutamayiyā paññāya sacchikiriyāpaññatti anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.

ne14:18.1.pli: “Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ pariññeyyan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ne14:18.2.pli: “So kho panāyaṃ dukkhasamudayo pahātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

ne14:18.3.pli: “so kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodho sacchikātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

ne14:18.4.pli: “sā kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvetabbā”ti me, bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ne14:19.1.pli: Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti cintāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññindriyassa.

ne14:20.1.pli: “Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ pariññātan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ne14:20.2.pli: “So kho panāyaṃ dukkhasamudayo pahīno”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

ne14:20.3.pli: so kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodho sacchikato”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

ne14:20.4.pli: “sā kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvitā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

ne14:21.1.pli: Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññātāvino indriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.

ne14:23.8.pli: “Abhindi kavacamivattasambhavan”ti abhinibbidāpaññatti cittassa, upādānapaññatti sabbaññutāya, padālanāpaññatti avijjaṇḍakosānaṃ.

ne14:25.1.pli: “Yo dukkhan”ti vevacanapaññatti ca dukkhassa pariññāpaññatti ca.

ne14:25.4.pli: “Kāmesu so jantu kathaṃ nameyyā”ti vevacanapaññatti ca kāmataṇhāya abhinivesapaññatti ca.

ne14:25.5.pli: “Kāmā hi loke saṅgoti ñatvā”ti paccatthikato dassanapaññatti kāmānaṃ.

ne14:25.6.pli: Kāmā hi aṅgārakāsūpamā maṃsapesūpamā pāvakakappā papātauragopamā ca.

ne14:25.7.pli: “Tesaṃ satīmā”ti apacayapaññatti pahānāya, nikkhepapaññatti kāyagatāya satiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa.

ne14:25.10.pli: Yadā hi yogī kāmā saṅgoti pajānāti.

ne14:25.11.pli: So kāmānaṃ anuppādāya kusale dhamme uppādayati, so anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya vāyamati.

ne14:25.14.pli: Tattha so uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā vāyamatīti ayaṃ appamādapaññatti bhāvanāya, nikkhepapaññatti vīriyindriyassa, ārakkhapaññatti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, ṭhitipaññatti adhicittasikkhāya.

ne14:27.3.pli: “Upadhibandhano bālo”ti pabhavapaññatti pāpakānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ, kiccapaññatti pariyuṭṭhānānaṃ.

ne14:27.7.pli: “Assirī viya khāyatī”ti dassanapaññatti dibbacakkhussa, nikkhepapaññatti paññācakkhussa.

ne14:27.8.pli: “Passato natthi kiñcanan”ti paṭivedhapaññatti sattānaṃ, rāgo kiñcanaṃ doso kiñcanaṃ moho kiñcanaṃ.

ne14:28.1.pli: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, no cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ.

ne14:28.2.pli: Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha.

ne14:28.3.pli: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti.

ne14:29.1.pli: “No cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatan”ti desanāpaññatti nibbānassa vevacanapaññatti ca.

ne14:29.2.pli: “Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyethā”ti vevacanapaññatti saṅkhatassa upanayanapaññatti ca.

ne14:29.3.pli: “Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatan”ti vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa jotanāpaññatti ca.

ne14:29.4.pli: “Tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti ayaṃ vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa, niyyānikapaññatti maggassa, nissaraṇapaññatti saṃsārato.

ne14:29.6.pli: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “ekaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ, paññattīhi vividhāhi desetī”ti.

ne15:3.4.pli: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni, ayaṃ indriyehi otaraṇā.

ne15:4.1.pli: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho, viññāṇanirodhā nāmarūpanirodho, nāmarūpanirodhā saḷāyatananirodho, saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho, vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti.

ne15:5.1.pli: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni—

ne15:5.2.pli: sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena, ayaṃ khandhehi otaraṇā.

ne15:6.1.pli: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.

ne15:7.1.pli: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ, no ca bhavaṅgaṃ.

ne15:8.1.pli: “Ayaṃ ahasmīti anānupassī”ti ayaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā samugghāto, sā sekkhāvimutti, tāniyeva sekkhāni pañcindriyāni.

ne15:9.1.pli: Tāniyeva sekkhāni pañcindriyāni vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, evaṃ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.

ne15:11.1.pli: Sāyeva vijjā saṅkhārapariyāpannā, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā, ayaṃ dhātūhi otaraṇā.

ne15:12.1.pli: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ, no ca bhavaṅgaṃ, ayaṃ āyatanehi otaraṇā.

ne15:13.1.pli: Sekkhāya ca vimuttiyā asekkhāya ca vimuttiyā vimutto udatāri oghaṃ atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāya.

ne15:14.1.pli: “Nissitassa calitaṃ, anissitassa calitaṃ natthi, calite asati passaddhi, passaddhiyā sati nati na hoti, natiyā asati āgatigati na hoti, āgatigatiyā asati cutūpapāto na hoti, cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena esevanto dukkhassā”ti.

ne15:15.1.pli: “Nissitassa calitan”ti nissayo nāma duvidho taṇhānissayo ca diṭṭhinissayo ca.

ne15:15.2.pli: Tattha yā rattassa cetanā, ayaṃ taṇhānissayo;

ne15:15.4.pli: Cetanā pana saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, evaṃ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.

ne15:16.1.pli: Tattha yā rattassa vedanā, ayaṃ sukhā vedanā.

ne15:16.2.pli: Yā sammūḷhassa vedanā, ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanā, imā dve vedanā vedanākkhandho.

ne15:17.1.pli: Tattha sukhā vedanā dve indriyāni sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyañca, adukkhamasukhā vedanā upekkhindriyaṃ.

ne15:18.1.pli: Tāniyeva indriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni, ye saṅkhārā sāsavā bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.

ne15:19.1.pli: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ sāsavaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ, ayaṃ āyatanehi otaraṇā.

ne15:20.1.pli: “Anissitassa calitaṃ natthī”ti samathavasena vā taṇhāya anissito vipassanāvasena vā diṭṭhiyā anissito.

ne15:20.2.pli: Yā vipassanā ayaṃ vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho, evaṃ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.

ne15:23.1.pli: Sāyeva vipassanā saṅkhārapariyāpannā, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.

ne15:24.1.pli: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ, no ca bhavaṅgaṃ.

ne15:25.1.pli: “Passaddhiyā satī”ti duvidhā passaddhi kāyikā ca cetasikā ca.

ne15:25.3.pli: Yaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ, ayaṃ cetasikā passaddhi.

ne15:25.4.pli: Passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yathābhūtaṃ pajānanto nibbindati, nibbindanto virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṃ “vimuttam”iti ñāṇaṃ hoti, “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti pajānāti.

ne15:25.5.pli: So na namati rūpesu, na saddesu, na gandhesu, na rasesu, na phoṭṭhabbesu, na dhammesu khayā rāgassa khayā dosassa khayā mohassa yena rūpena tathāgataṃ tiṭṭhantaṃ carantaṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya, tassa rūpassa khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā rūpasaṅkhaye vimutto, tathāgato atthītipi na upeti, natthītipi na upeti, atthi natthītipi na upeti, nevatthi no natthītipi na upeti.

ne15:25.6.pli: Atha kho gambhīro appameyyo asaṅkheyyo nibbutotiyeva saṅkhaṃ gacchati khayā rāgassa, khayā dosassa, khayā mohassa.

ne15:26.4.pli: Yena viññāṇena tathāgataṃ tiṭṭhantaṃ carantaṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya, tassa viññāṇassa khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā viññāṇasaṅkhaye vimutto, tathāgato atthītipi na upeti, natthītipi na upeti, atthi natthītipi na upeti, nevatthi no natthītipi na upeti.

ne15:26.5.pli: Atha kho gambhīro appameyyo asaṅkheyyo nibbutotiyeva saṅkhaṃ gacchati khayā rāgassa, khayā dosassa, khayā mohassa.

ne15:26.8.pli: Āgatigatīpi na bhavanti, “nevidhā”ti chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu.

ne15:26.10.pli: “Na ubhayamantarenā”ti phassasamuditesu dhammesu attānaṃ na passati.

ne15:26.12.pli: So duvidho lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca.

ne15:26.13.pli: Tattha lokiyo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, yāva jarāmaraṇā.

ne15:26.14.pli: Lokuttaro sīlavato avippaṭisāro jāyati, yāva nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāti.

ne15:26.15.pli: Tenāha bhagavā “nissitassa calitaṃ anissitassa calitaṃ natthi …pe…

ne15:29.1.pli: “Ye keci sokā paridevitā vā, dukkhā ca lokasmimanekarūpā piyaṃ paṭiccappabhavanti ete”ti—

ne15:30.1.pli: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ, evaṃ sabbaṃ.

ne15:32.1.pli: Tāniyeva indriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni, ye saṅkhārā sāsavā bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.

ne15:33.1.pli: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ sāsavaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ.

ne15:35.2.pli: Taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, evaṃ sabbaṃ.

ne15:36.2.pli: So samatho dve indriyāni satindriyaṃ samādhindriyañca.

ne15:38.1.pli: Soyeva samatho saṅkhārapariyāpanno, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.

ne15:39.1.pli: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ, no ca bhavaṅgaṃ.

ne15:43.3.pli: Anunayaṃ paṭighañca pana taṇhāpakkho, taṇhāya ca pana dasarūpīni āyatanāni padaṭṭhānaṃ.

ne15:44.1.pli: Tāniyeva dasa rūpīni rūpakāyo nāmasampayutto, tadubhayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, evaṃ sabbaṃ.

ne15:47.1.pli: Tattha yo rūpakāyo imāni pañca rūpīni indriyāni, yo nāmakāyo imāni pañca arūpīni indriyāni, imāni dasa indriyāni.

ne15:50.1.pli: Ayaṃ saupādisesā nibbānadhātu, ayaṃ dhātūhi otaraṇā.

ne15:51.1.pli: Sāyeva saupādisesā nibbānadhātu vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, evaṃ sabbaṃ.

ne15:54.1.pli: Sāyeva vijjā saṅkhārapariyāpannā, ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā.

ne15:55.1.pli: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ, no ca bhavaṅgaṃ.

ne16:1.3.pli: Yathā āyasmā ajito pārāyane bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati—

ne16:4.1.pli: “Kenassu nivuto loko”ti pañhe “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.

ne16:4.2.pli: “Kenassu nappakāsatī”ti pañhe “vivicchā pamādā nappakāsatī”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.

ne16:4.3.pli: “Kissābhilepanaṃ brūsī”ti pañhe “jappābhilepanaṃ brūmī”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.

ne16:4.4.pli: “Kiṃsu tassa mahabbhayan”ti pañhe “dukkhamassa mahabbhayan”ti suddho ārambho.

ne16:7.1.pli: “Savanti sabbadhi sotā, sotānaṃ kiṃ nivāraṇan”ti pañhe “yāni sotāni lokasmiṃ, sati tesaṃ nivāraṇan”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.

ne16:7.2.pli: “Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi, kena sotā pidhīyare”ti pañhe “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare”ti suddho ārambho.

ne16:11.3.pli: Yattha evaṃ suddho ārambho, so pañho visajjito bhavati.

ne16:11.4.pli: Yattha pana ārambho asuddho, na tāva so pañho visajjito bhavati.
